Class Creature

  • java.lang.Object
    • Creature
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Animal, Person

    public abstract class Creature
extends java.lang.Object
    Creature is the class to collect logic and variables that will be shared by all Creature subclasses
    Since:
    12/21/2020
    Author:
    Bennett Forkner

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String catchPhrase
      The String that is displayed whenever this Creature beats another Creature in a fight
      private java.util.ArrayList<ConversationEvent> conversations
      The ArrayList that stores conversations that can be had with this Creature
      protected int healthPoints
      The Integer representing the amount of health that this Creature has left
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Item> inventory
      The ArrayList that sores Items in the Creature's inventory
      protected int maxHealthPoints
      The Integer representing the maximum amount of health that this Creature is allowed
      private java.lang.String name
      The friendly name of the Creature
      protected int strength
      The Integer representing the strength of this Creature's attacks
